Subject: Editing for Your Spouse/Partner/BFF/Pet
Description: 'Can you read this and tell me what you think?' is a question to test any relationship. We will learn some ways to navigate that communications mine-field while musing on the nature of editing, the care and feeding of your larval writer and some small, practical steps towards upping our editing game.  Speakers include:Scott Favre, Clif Flynt, Janice Leach, Jim Leach, Michael Cieslak - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Pupal Writers Panel
Description: You've written a bit, you've published a bit, now what?  Speakers include:Jen Haeger, Christian Klaver, Ken MacGregor, Christopher Purrett, Janice Leach - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Teens of the Wasteland
Description: Why do so many contemporary YA novels feature a post-apocalyptic setting with teens on a journey across what remains of civilization? What needs to these books fulfill, and has the wave of their popularity already peaked? If so, whats next?  Speakers include:Emmy Jackson, Jon David, Janice Leach - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes
